name: CrackerFiller
description:
'CrackerFiller' is a game about filling Christmas crackers. At a factory that makes Christmas crackers. Your character is the person that puts the things into the Christmas crackers. At the factory!

Features include:
Blurry art style
A tiny picture of a dog
Mod support (that goes unexplained)
Monologue (dialogue if you talk to the screen)
Very limited colour palette
Theme-appropriate custom-crafted music and sound effects

Game made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020. Team was just me (funny Michael).

Engine is Lua using LÖVE.

Top 5 Highscores:

330 - kitkaty3

288 - MStout

(Please report your high scores, I hope to continue to be very impressed)
